resources.string: Built at the end of 1300s, used as summer residence of kings. Fortified, then used in the 16-17th centuries during the wars against the Ottoman Empire.

Baroque palace. Designed by Jakab Fellener. Built in the 1700s, by the count Esterházy family in the 18th century. Used as the residence of the family until World War II, then became a psychiatric clinic, later as a hospital. Currently out of use.
Built in the mid 1700s. Designed by Jakab Fellner. Renovated in 2004. The digital clockwork rings a tune of 495 chimes, five minutes before every hour.
Built in the late 1700s. Designed by Antal Schweiger. Built on the Calvary Hill. 40 meter high, 200 stairs leads to the top.

Baroque church, built in the mid and late 1700s. Designed by Franz Anton Pilgram, Jakab Fellner and József Grossmann. It has two bells, the one in the northern tower weights 560 kg, the other one in the southern tower is 3200 kg.

Baroque palace. Originally built as a summer residence of the count Esterházy family. Now it is located in a nice forest park with a lake. Great place to chill out. Next to the palace there is an outdoor concert venue.

Fancy for a stroll around lake, or just find a great spot for picnic? The Old Lake is definitely a must for you. A full circle around the lake is about 7 kilometer. By the lake in the town you can also find bars and restaurants, historic monuments and architecture, concert venues.

Water sports and recreational activities are available, such as kayaking, canoeing, dragon boating, outriggering, etc. Other services: Bicycle rental, Segway tours, Local hiking tours, Gym, Conference rooms
A nice trail built on a swamp. A beautiful place, where you can see birds, snakes, turtles, frogs, or even beavers in their wild habitat. Worth to visit it for families with children as well.
Beautiful golf course. The lawn is always neat. You can stay in a nice hotel with all the service you need.

Quiet piece of nature, hidden in the forrest. Lake with houseboats all around it, popular for fishing. Lake is accessible by car from main road or by foot from nearby camp. Some of the houseboats are also available for rent. There is also a buffet and shop with fishing accessories.

Peace and nature. Finally some clean air to breathe with and rest for tired eyes. It is a good idea to go there on a hot day because the walk in the forest is refreshing. Recommended to families with children.
Location: Bocsájtó völgy, Aggostyán (village), 5 km from Tata.

An authentic presentation of the military traditions, cultural history of the 16-17th century during the wars against the Ottoman Empire. The festival is also a colourful demonstration of the Turkish and Christian culture. The festival\'s main event is the re-enactment of the siege of Castle Tata in 1597, in authentic uniforms and military equipment of that period.
18-20 May 2018. Programs are all around the town.\n The historical siege takes place in the castle.

The biggest Hungarian festival for families is traditionally hold in the last weekend of June in Tata. The Festival has a wonderful location, in the center of the town, by the Old Lake. The water and flower programs – the water carnival in the Old Lake, with boats lighted by thousands of lanterns, the airshow, or the Hungarian floral design competition in the Castle – give the festival a special beauty.
21-24 June 2018. Multiple locations, concert venues all\n around the town.
Hungarian folk dances, concerts, gastronomy, handcraft market
The festival is about the traditions of riding in Hungary and Europe. The organisers aim to make riding more popular as a sport or a lifestyle.
A trendy place where you can drink excellent quality coffees, teas, smoothies. You can also have healthy snacks and cakes.\n38 Hajdú Street, Tata 2890
Exquisite quality chocolates, truffles, hot chocolates, chocolate cakes. Definitely a must and not just for a chocolate lover.\n2/5 Alkotmány Street, Tata 2890
This place is the home of original italian pizzas, run by its Italian owner\nÉpítők parkja, Tata 2890
Elegant and modern.\n22 Ady Endre Street, Tata 2890
